p: Juan Pablo Bohoslavsky is currently coordinator of the postgraduate course on ‘Human rights and public policies in Covid-19 times’, Universidad Nacional de Río Negro, Argentina. He is also consultant on finance and human rights to the OHCHR. He was the Independent Expert on Debt and Human Rights at the United Nations between 2014 and 2020; he worked for UNCTAD, ECLAC and the Argentine State in international arbitrations. He has a Ph.D. in Law, and he is author of books and articles on public debt, investments, and human rights.
